text: Lisa Robin Kelly (March 5, 1970 - August 15, 2013) was an American actress who acted mostly on television. She played Laurie Forman in the sitcom That '70s Show. She also acted in other sitcoms for TV. Kelly was raised in Connecticut. She died in Altadena, Los Angeles County on August 15, 2013 from a drug- overdose, aged 43. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:1970 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Lisa Robin Kelly
